Name: PRISONER 17
About the game: Prisoner 17 is a dynamic first-person action platformer (In Death Run mode). In which you have to play the role of a prisoner who got a chance at redemption. Pass all the tests and get the freedom you deserve. Run and overcome deadly traps, destroy killer drones, go through the mazes, use a jetpack to double jump on special levels, act decisively. - More than 70 types of traps and their various combinations. - Nice Sci-Fi soundtrack. - 20 long levels with different traps. - Traps of varying difficulty. - Beautiful tropical environment. - With each new level, the game becomes more difficult. - Set your own time records.
Meta Title: PRISONER 17: Apr 12, 2021, A13 and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on PRISONER 17? Check out the release date (Apr 12, 2021), developer insights from A13, and a complete game summary.
